name: Nasty Platformer
description:
Do you know what madness is? Repeating the same action over and over again in the hope of results. This fun frog game may change the way you think about indie platformers.

Nasty Platformer is a small adventure in a world of endless traps awaiting you at any moment of the game. With only one life, your character will end the game at the most unexpected moments. And the goal of the game is simple - reach the end of the level, avoiding all obstacles.

Game Features:
- One life and many dangers
- Calm soundtrack
